response.answer_text: Pierce’s situation was much worse, but as far as I can see, he never resorted to using his position to illegally financially benefit his family, like Joe Biden. Also, Biden made the truck driver involved in his wife’s accident life miserable for many years, saying he was drunk, which was proven to be a lie. Then they will tell you he apologized to the family of the truck driver. They don’t tell you that it was after his daughter requested an apology and he gave one—————over 30 years after the accident which was his wife’s fault.
